seg-source.mrk: Where are the log files?

target.mrk: Wo sind die Logdateien?

trans-unit.source: There are multiple different log files that yield information in case of an error scenario. The following subsections will assist you in finding the log files for every part of the Signavio Workflow Accelerator application. The most important one, regarding the Workflow Accelerator system is the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">effektif.log</kbd>. It will contain any application related log entries.

seg-source.mrk: There are multiple different log files that yield information in case of an error scenario.
The following subsections will assist you in finding the log files for every part of the Signavio Workflow Accelerator application.
The most important one, regarding the Workflow Accelerator system is the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">effektif.log</kbd>.
It will contain any application related log entries.

target.mrk: In Fallen von technischen Problemen können Sie verschiedene Logdateien einsehen.
Der folgende Abschnitt erläutert, wo Sie die Logdateien finden.
Die wichtigste Logdatei ist <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">effektif.log</kbd>.
Diese Datei enthält alle anwendungsbezogenen Logeinträge.

seg-source.mrk: Workflow Accelerator

target.mrk: Workflow Accelerator

trans-unit.source: The Workflow Accelerator log file effektif.log can be found in the location you configured in the logging configuration file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/logback.xml</kbd>. This file contains the line:

seg-source.mrk: The Workflow Accelerator log file effektif.log can be found in the location you configured in the logging configuration file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/logback.xml</kbd>.
This file contains the line:

target.mrk: Die Workflow Accelerator-Logdatei effektif.log kann in dem Verzeichnis gefunden werden, das Sie in der Konfigurationsdatei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/logback.xml</kbd> eingetragen haben.
Die Konfigurationsdatei enthält den Eintrag:

trans-unit.source: The value contains the directory of the log file. Besides the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">effektif.log</kbd> the directory contains more log files for every day of the past 30 days the server was running. If you are looking for any information about incidents on a specific date, open the log file with the respective timestamp.

seg-source.mrk: The value contains the directory of the log file.
Besides the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">effektif.log</kbd> the directory contains more log files for every day of the past 30 days the server was running.
If you are looking for any information about incidents on a specific date, open the log file with the respective timestamp.

target.mrk: Der Wert enthält das Logverzeichnis.
Neben <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">effektif.log</kbd> enthält das Verzeichnis weitere Logfiles über die letzten 30 Tage, an denen der Server ausgeführt wurde.
Sie können über die Zeitstempel der Logdateien bequem Informationen über einen bestimmten Tage einsehen.

seg-source.mrk: Script Engine

target.mrk: Script Engine

trans-unit.source: The Workflow Accelerator Script Engine log files have been configured in the configuration file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME/configuration.onpremise.js</kbd>. The values for the entries <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">log</kbd><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">file</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">log</kbd><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">errorFile</kbd> will tell you the name and location of the log files.

seg-source.mrk: The Workflow Accelerator Script Engine log files have been configured in the configuration file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME/configuration.onpremise.js</kbd>.

The values for the entries <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">log</kbd><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">file</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">log</kbd><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">errorFile</kbd> will tell you the name and location of the log files.

target.mrk: Die Workflow Accelerator Script Engine Log-Dateien wurden in der Konfigurationsdatei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME/configuration.onpremise.js</kbd> konfiguriert.

Die Werte für die Einträge <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">log</kbd> <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">file</kbd> ud <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">log</kbd> <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">errorFile</kbd> nennen Ihnen die Namen der Log-Dateien.

seg-source.mrk: Mail Relay

target.mrk: Mail Relay

trans-unit.source: The Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay log file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.log</kbd> has been configured in the logging configuration file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logback.xml</kbd>. This file contains the line:

seg-source.mrk: The Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay log file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.log</kbd> has been configured in the logging configuration file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logback.xml</kbd>.
This file contains the line:

target.mrk: Die Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay-Logdatei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.log</kbd> kann in dem Verzeichnis gefunden werden, das Sie in der Konfigurationsdatei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME/logback.xml</kbd> eingetragen haben.
Die Konfigurationsdatei enthält den Eintrag:

trans-unit.source: The value contains the directory of the log file. Besides the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.log</kbd> the directory contains more log files for every day of the past 30 days the server was running. If you are looking for any information about incidents on a specific date, open the log file with the respective timestamp.

seg-source.mrk: The value contains the directory of the log file.
Besides the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.log</kbd> the directory contains more log files for every day of the past 30 days the server was running.
If you are looking for any information about incidents on a specific date, open the log file with the respective timestamp.

target.mrk: Der Wert enthält das Logverzeichnis.
Neben <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail.log</kbd> enthält das Verzeichnis weitere Logfiles über die letzten 30 Tage, an denen der Server ausgeführt wurde.
Sie können über die Zeitstempel der Logdateien bequem Informationen über einen bestimmten Tage einsehen.

seg-source.mrk: MongoDB

target.mrk: MongoDB

trans-unit.source: The MongoDB log file is configured by the logpath option. This is either defined in the MongoDB configuration file that you reference when starting MongoDB or directly as a start parameter of MongoDB. Anyway, the value of this parameter will tell you where to find the log file.

seg-source.mrk: The MongoDB log file is configured by the logpath option.
This is either defined in the MongoDB configuration file that you reference when starting MongoDB or directly as a start parameter of MongoDB.
Anyway, the value of this parameter will tell you where to find the log file.

target.mrk: Der Pfad zur MongoDB-Logdatei ist über das Parameter logpath definiert.

alt-trans.seg-source: This is either defined in the MongoDB configuration file that you reference when starting MongoDB or directly as a start parameter of MongoDB. Anyway, the value of this parameter will tell you where to find the log file.
alt-trans.target: Diesen Parameter können Sie entweder beim Starten von MongoDB oder in der MongoDB-Konfigurationsdatei festlegen.

trans-unit.source: On Linux, one default location where the log file can be found is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/var/log/mongodb/mongodb.log</kbd>. Whereas default locations for the configuration file are <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mongodb.conf</kbd> or <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mongod.conf</kbd>. These locations can change depending on the distribution and depend on how you have installed MongoDB.

seg-source.mrk: On Linux, one default location where the log file can be found is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/var/log/mongodb/mongodb.log</kbd>.
Whereas default locations for the configuration file are <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mongodb.conf</kbd> or <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mongod.conf</kbd>.
These locations can change depending on the distribution and depend on how you have installed MongoDB.

target.mrk: Unter Linux ist der standardmäßige Pfad der Logdatei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/var/log/mongodb/mongodb.log</kbd>.
Hierbei ist der standardmäßige Pfad der Konfigurationsdatei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mongodb.conf</kbd> oder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mongod.conf</kbd>.
Berücksichtigen Sie, dass diese Pfade abhängig von Ihrer Linux-Distribution und Ihrem Installationsvorgang von MongoDB variieren können.

trans-unit.source: If you are using Windows and followed the instructions in this guide to setup MongoDB, you should find the log file in your MongoDB installation directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MONGO_HOME\logs</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: If you are using Windows and followed the instructions in this guide to setup MongoDB, you should find the log file in your MongoDB installation directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MONGO_HOME\logs</kbd>.

target.mrk: Falls Sie Windows verwenden und den Anweisungen zur Installation von MongoDB in diesem Handbuch gefolgt sind, finden Sie die MongoDB-Logdateien im Ordner logs Ihres MongoDB-Installationsverzeichnisses, also unter <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MONGO_HOME\\logs</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Tomcat

target.mrk: Tomcat

trans-unit.source: If not configured otherwise, the log files of the Apache Tomcat application server can be found either in the installation directory of the Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME\logs</kbd> (Windows) or a common log directory e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/var/log/tomcat7</kbd> (Linux).

seg-source.mrk: If not configured otherwise, the log files of the Apache Tomcat application server can be found either in the installation directory of the Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME\logs</kbd> (Windows) or a common log directory e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/var/log/tomcat7</kbd> (Linux).

target.mrk: Falls nicht anders festgelegt, befinden sich die Logdateien von Tomcat unter Windows im Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME\\logs</kbd> und unter Linux im gewohnten Logverzeichnis, zum Beispiel <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/var/log/tomcat7</kbd>.
